column2: # Teste t entre os grupos control e Mg2

In the report() function, for htest objects, you can try providing the data argument manually,
  e.g., report(x, data = data).

Aviso: Unable to retrieve data from htest object.
  Returning an [1mapproximate[22m effect size using t_to_d().

Effect sizes were labelled following Cohen's (1988) recommendations.

The Welch Two Sample t-test testing the difference between control and Mg2 (mean of x = 15.68, mean of y =
10.52) suggests that the effect is positive, statistically significant, and large (difference = 5.16, 95%
CI [3.83, 6.49], t(17.35) = 8.15, p < .001; Cohen's d = 3.92, 95% CI [2.30, 5.49])
